abstract: A tailgate party recipe that goes beyond hot dogs -- sweet and spicy ribs.
snippet: A tailgate party recipe that goes beyond hot dogs -- sweet and spicy ribs.
lead_paragraph: Sure, tailgate party menus can be as simple as a disposable grill and a package of hot dogs. The more serious, though, seem lacking without some all-out BBQ. Enter Tammy Herchel this week and her Superawesome Sweet and Spicy Smoked Ribs. Herchel, a Florida Gators fan, promises a happy pregame meal, and offers some tips to satisfy every rib-loving palate.

headline.main: Tailgating Recipes: Superawesome Sweet and Spicy Smoked Ribs
